select count(c.id) as num, concat(u.user_name,'(', u.user_account,')') as spliter from sepp_test_mission c, sepp_user u where u.user_id = c.spliter
and exists (select 'X' from sepp_test_plan p where p.rel_id = #{relId} and p.plan_type = c.type and p.id = c.plan_id)
and c.req_id in (select r.id from sepp_requirement r where r.product_id = #{productId}) and c.split_date >= #{qTimeBegin} and c.split_date <= #{qTimeEnd}
group by c.spliter order by num

select count(c.id) as num, concat(u.user_name,'(', u.user_account,')') as responser from sepp_test_mission c, sepp_user u where u.user_id = c.responser
and exists (select 'X' from sepp_test_plan p where p.rel_id = #{relId} and p.plan_type = c.type and p.id = c.plan_id)
and c.req_id in (select r.id from sepp_requirement r where r.product_id = #{productId}) and c.split_date >= #{qTimeBegin} and c.split_date <= #{qTimeEnd}
group by c.responser order by num

select count(c.req_id) as num, c.status from sepp_test_mission c where 1 = 1
and exists (select 'X' from sepp_test_plan p where p.rel_id = #{relId} and p.plan_type = c.type and p.id = c.plan_id)
and c.req_id in (select id from sepp_requirement where product_id = #{productId}) and c.split_date >= #{qTimeBegin} and c.split_date <= #{qTimeEnd}
group by c.status order by num

select count(c.req_id) as num, c.type from sepp_test_mission c where 1 = 1
and exists (select 'X' from sepp_test_plan p where p.rel_id = #{relId} and p.plan_type = c.type and p.id = c.plan_id)
and c.req_id in (select id from sepp_requirement where product_id = #{productId}) and c.split_date >= #{qTimeBegin} and c.split_date <= #{qTimeEnd}
group by c.type order by num

select case when c.manpower <= 1 then '1个人日以内' when c.manpower > 1 and c.manpower <= 3 then '1~3个人日' when c.manpower > 3 and c.manpower <= 5 then '3~5个人日' else '5个人日以上' end as tmCost, count(c.id) as num from sepp_test_mission c where 1 = 1
and exists (select 'X' from sepp_test_plan p where p.rel_id = #{relId} and p.plan_type = c.type and p.id = c.plan_id)
and c.req_id in (select r.id from sepp_requirement r where r.product_id = #{productId}) and c.split_date >= #{qTimeBegin} and c.split_date <= #{qTimeEnd}
group by tmCost order by tmCost
